name: Please Save Martha!
description:
Controls-> mouse only

Change perspective between Spirit and Martha by right clicking(two views)

In Spirit View guide martha by being near her.

Use Martha View , when over white particle effect to find memories of the spirit,

Use headphones to get audio hints about the location of Button while searching for memories.

If left in the right state the game can be completed without any interaction at all (minimal interaction) aswellas you can find memories of the spirit (two views).

Enjoy!
